dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, places of historical interest.
Decorative cartouche with descriptive text: Medius meridianus 72 ad quem reliqui inclinantur iuxta rationes parallelorem 31. 36. ad circulum maximum.
